title: Get Started with CockroachDB
description: Start a local cluster, use built-in tools, and start learning CockroachDB SQL

courses.title: Start a Local Cluster
courses.description: Start a local multi-node cluster, use built-in tools, and experience fault tolerance and scaling

courses.title: Learn CockroachDB SQL
courses.description: Learn the most essential CockroachDB SQL statements using an interactive SQL shell connected to a temporary, single-node CockroachDB cluster
